name: Temple Raid VR
description: Temple Raid VR is a classic exploration game developed specifically for VR. The call of a timeless guardian draws you into an ancient temple, where you can discover a great treasure that has been undisturbed for 10,000 years!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980TI DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
